text:
Oh, Kogane.
Yeah, here's the photos.

Of course. I picked out a few that
might work for promotional shots.

Let's see here~... Well, dang...
It's all smiles in these photos~!

Nah, nah! That's not it, Kogane.
Look, everyone's chosen a few smiley shots too.

I figured your charm ain't just about being cool, Kogane.
Even them smiles got a certain charm to 'em.

I figured if there's a gap between the cool performances,
people won't be able to look away.

Ah-huh... I see now~!
In that case... yeah, them smiley ones'll do just fine~!
